short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send notes that will self destruct after being read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension from NotesOnline.com allows you to create online notes through an extension in the browser without visiting the official website and immediately share the link with anyone, which will be deleted after reading. 

The service allows you to create one-time notes that are deleted after reading and cannot be viewed again. We do not store any data from our users; our goal is to simplify interactions with our product and make it as easy as possible to use our product.
